title.rendered: Modern Collection’s maxed-out design potential in Sunset Magazine

content.rendered:
In the September Makeover issue of Sunset Magazine, Zinc European Ledge from the new Modern Collection is featured in the “In the Western Home” section under the title, “Rocking Out.” The article states:

“Sleek and contemporary might not be the first words that you associate with Eldorado Stone. But the brand known for its rustic surfaces recently launched its Modern Collection, a line of streamlined stone veneers that provides a fresh approach to texture-rich palettes. Well suited for exterior and interior applications, the stones come in varying heights and lengths, allowing you to mix and match for maxed-out design potential.”

But the brand known for its rustic […]
